entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 60%
